H0.text: In February 1987, which UK airline was privatised and listed on the London Stock Exchange. British Airways

H1.text: In February 1987, which UK airline was privatised and listed on the London Stock Exchange. British Midland

H2.text: In February 1987, which UK airline was privatised and listed on the London Stock Exchange. British Caledonian

H3.text: In February 1987, which UK airline was privatised and listed on the London Stock Exchange. Ba.com

A4.text: British Airways was privatised in February 1987 as part of a wider privatisation plan by the Thatcher government.

A5.text: British Airways was floated on the London Stock Exchange in February 1987.
